description:
I have been using the functionality where you can save a website as an app on my browser. I was missing the shortcuts and autocomplete of tags from windows and mobile, so i gave kuro a try, hoping that it would provide what a webpage cannot. 
- it did not -
the interface of Kuro feels identical to the saved webpage, with the exception that the side panel has different 'folders' and English as a language instead of the lanuage from my microsoft account. The shortcuts do not appear to work on my system, but kudo's for thinking about them and showing the option to modify them.
overall not really convincing me to stop using the website-as-an-app feature from my browser
summary: not much more than a chrome site-to-app
